introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: Welcome to the Canadian Tui Na Association. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services.

information_we_collect.title: Information We Collect
information_we_collect.text: We collect the following types of information to make our association work effectively:
information_we_collect.personal_information: Personal Information: When you sign up for membership, we collect personal details such as your name, address, email, phone number, and professional credentials.
information_we_collect.payment_information: Payment Information: For membership fees and other transactions, we collect payment details through Stripe, a secure payment processing service.
information_we_collect.usage_data: Usage Data: We use Google Analytics to collect data on how visitors interact with our website. This includes information about your browser, IP address, pages visited, and the time spent on each page.

how_we_use_your_information.title: How We Use Your Information
how_we_use_your_information.text: The information we collect is used for the following purposes:
how_we_use_your_information.membership_management: Membership Management: To process your membership application, maintain our member database, and provide you with member benefits.
how_we_use_your_information.payment_processing: Payment Processing: To securely process payments for membership fees and other transactions.
how_we_use_your_information.website_improvement: Website Improvement: To analyze website usage and improve our services and user experience.

data_sharing_and_security.title: Data Sharing and Security
data_sharing_and_security.text: We are committed to ensuring that your information is secure. We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data. We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties except in the following cases:
data_sharing_and_security.service_providers: Service Providers: We may share information with third-party service providers (such as Stripe and Google Analytics) who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business, as long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.
data_sharing_and_security.legal_requirements: Legal Requirements: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities.

cookies_and_tracking_technologies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies_and_tracking_technologies.text: Our website uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience. Cookies are small files that a site or its service provider transfers to your computer’s hard drive through your web browser (if you allow) that enables the site’s systems to recognize your browser and capture and remember certain information.

your_rights.title: Your Rights
your_rights.text: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. If you wish to exercise these rights or have any questions about our privacy practices, please contact us using the information provided below.

contact_us.title: Contact Us
contact_us.text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

changes_to_privacy_policy.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes_to_privacy_policy.text: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.
